title: [DOC] "build requirements" section in installation section, may be missing content or may be better moved
body:
There is an inconsistency in the developer install instructions:
https://www.sktime.org/en/stable/installation.html
at the top, it is said that step 2, the "build requirements" section, depends on the operating system.

However, there is no distinction between different operating systems in the "build requirements" section, and it also seems to be specific to windows?
It is also substantially shortened, I believe since we removed the dependency on C, so some content might have been cut erroneously, or it might have been cut and now step 2 is much simpler.

In either case, we need to review this:
* is step 2 no longer operating system dependent? If so, how do we deal with windows specific stuff such as WSL?
* possibly move step 2 in sequence with step 1 and step 3 since step 2 is no longer highly complicated (since removal of C)

FYI @lmmentel, did you make the change that shortens step 2?
